roleset.name: defraud or cheat
roleset.note: BILK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bilk' based on ebn instances. (from bilk.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: caught in the act
example.text: Today, she took center stage in a far grittier place, *PRO*-1 pleading *PRO*-2 guilty to *PRO* bilking hundreds of wealthy art patrons out of tens of millions of dollars.
example.arg: out of tens of millions of dollars
